doc.field: "The Gift of the Centre for Iranian Democratic Youth to Youth Unity of All Burma" - demonstrations during the Iran Oil Crisis (Abadan Crisis), 1951.
"The Gift of the Centre for Iranian Democratic Youth to Youth Unity of All Burma" - demonstrations during the Iran Oil Crisis (Abadan Crisis), 1951.

Back inside cover of the album "The Gift of the Centre for Iranian Democratic Youth to Youth Unity of All Burma" - demonstrations during the Iran Oil Crisis (Abadan Crisis), 1951, with handwritten Farsi text: "Young people, unite. March on for permanent peace. Long live the friendship between Burmese and Iranian youths.".

Back inside cover of the album "The Gift of the Centre for Iranian Democratic Youth to Youth Unity of All Burma" - demonstrations during the Iran Oil Crisis (Abadan Crisis), 1951, with handwritten Farsi text: "Young people, unite. March on for permanent peace. Long live the friendship between Burmese and Iranian youths.".

Back inside cover of the album Demonstrations in Tehran during the Abadan Crisis, 1951, with handwritten Farsi text: "Young people get united. March on for permanent peace. Long live the friendship between Burmese and Iranian youths.".: 1951
